nodes.text: Trop was a gas giant–type planet with eleven moons that occupied the sixth orbital position around the star Asar. It was located within the Ilum system, a part of the Unknown Regions' 7G sector.
Trop was mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed the Ilum system, and therefore Trop, in grid square G-7.
